'''Komaniya Express''' is a famous delivery company based in [[Inazuma]]. The company provides delivery services in Inazuma and they are widely praised for its punctual and safe delivery. 

Recently, the company began expanding its services overseas and they are now providing delivery services to other nations, thus having to hire more staff because business has been going well.

==Members==
* [[Kirara]] &mdash; Gold Level Courier<ref>{{Ref/CS|Kirara|5}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* Komaniya Express and their logo seem to be based on {{w|Yamato Transport}}, one of Japan's largest delivery service companies.
* [[Kirara]] handles all of the international deliveries because she is the quickest out of all the staff due to being a [[youkai]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Roll! A Sea of New Acquaintances}}</ref>
* [[Yae Miko]] was the one who recommended Kirara to seek employment in Komaniya Express after seeing how Kirara was enjoying the streets of [[Inazuma City]].<ref>{{Ref/CS|Kirara|2}}</ref>
